tool_description: API for scraping content from blog articles. Just add your link and receive all the structured information that you may need. No need to implement your own scrapers, battle with API limits or parse complicated CSS just to extract the data that you need. Use Content Scraper API and let it do the heavy lifting for you while you enjoy building your application.
name: Content Scraper
title: Content Scraper

api_list.name: Scrape article content and split into chapters
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to fetch the content from an article. Split the content into chapters. Each chapter will have a word count.

api_list.name: Scrape article endpoint
api_list.description: Scrape the article blog and extract useful information.
